full_record.present_illness_positive: Mr. ___ is a ___ year old male with a history of HTN, ESRD (___), who presents with pain from his tunneled HD line. He  had been receiving dialysis in prison at ___ without issues until today, last dialyzed on ___. However today the patient had pain on his right leg near the catheter site, with yellow/green discharge noted. The line itself was difficult to flush and painful, causing backflow. Repo
full_record.present_illness_negative: denies fevers/chills, dyspnea, chest pain, palpitations, abdominal  pain, n/v. denies fever/chills, palpitations, chest pain, lightheadedness, headache, vision changes, nausea/vomiting. no growth to date.
